price: 244. Y luchen por la causa de Al-lah, y sepan que Al-lah todo lo oye y todo lo sabe.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
